## nextTick() function

Next tick with callback

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function nextTick(cb: () => any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | () =&gt; any | Callback to be invoked in the next tick |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
